info.bio:
Central California’s country hip-hop rebels the Moonshine Bandits are making noise with their new album “Whiskey and Women”, as the album landed at position No. 54 on BILLBOARD’s Top New Artist Albums (Heatseekers) chart, which lists the best-selling albums by new and developing artists. The Moonshine Bandits’ intoxicating musical mixture of hip-hop and country won over fans of different genres as their new album simultaneously hit Billboard’s Rap chart at No. 44, Current Country chart at No. 65, and the Independent albums chart at No. 162. Take 1 shot of Johnny Cash influence, 1 shot of the Beastie Boys influence and a dash of dancing girls, and you've got the unconventional new duo, the Moonshine Bandits.  

The Bandits have toured Nationally, recorded or performed with established artists such as Uncle Kracker, David Allan Coe, REHAB, TECHN9NE, Kottonmouth Kings, Everlast, Pepper, N2Deep, Twiztid, Boondox, Haystak, Vanilla Ice, Expendables, E-40 and the list goes on. Moonshine Bandits songs “Sweet Home California” , “Moonshine” featuring Danny Boone from the group REHAB (Sittin’ at a Bar song), and “Super Goggles” have all received Radio Airplay on FM Top 40 Stations in various regions.  The Moonshine Bandits are definitely the working man's champion and continue to earn their stripes in a tough industry.  The Bandits endorse their own brand of Liquor beverage called "Moonshine Bandits Outlaw Moonshine" The 99 proof spirit sold in regional grocery/liquor stores and online at www.outlawshine.com. One of the reasons Tex and Bird became known as the Moonshine Bandits is because of Tex's deep family roots of bootlegging booze during the Prohibition years.  Tex's great grandfather used a barber shop as a front while he peddled alcohol illegally in baby carriages to community members, family, friends and politicians.  This all took place in Northern California during the years of the Great Depression.  

The Bandits have earned a ton of industry credits with music placed in Extreme Sports DVDs, 4x4 DVD's, and close to 1,000 live shows performed.  
Moonshine Bandits have performed in Biker Clubhouses where most Police Departments wouldn’t even step foot in, Smoke Filled Dive Bars, Biker Bars, Clubs, Harley Davidson Events, Cage Fighting Events, 4x4 Mud Conventions, Beer Festivals, Music Venues, and just about every other type of venue you can imagine. The ultimate honor was receiving a phone call from the United States Military to perform at Fort Irwin, CA. The Moonshine Bandits performed on July 4, 2010 at the Fort Irwin Military Base located in the Mojave Desert for thousands of our U.S. Troops. Their Live performances rival many of today’s mega super stars. Their show consists of backup singer Derrty D, Award Winning DJ ChopStiqs, Shiner Girl Dancer Kristin aka Firecracker, their drummer B. Diddy and a lifted 4 x 4 Limo. If the Bandits are in your town, be ready for a Hell Raisin’ Good ol’ Time! 

As the Moonshine Bandits gained momentum and their fan base started spreading outside of California to different states, and to Japan, Canada, Sweden, and troops stationed overseas, SHINER NATION WAS BUILT. Shiner Nation was formed to unite all the Moonshine Bandits fans. The Definition of a Shiner is a Rowdy Individual commonly known as a Moonshine Bandit Fan. Living the Shiner Lifestyle isn’t just about the music, it’s also about partying it up and raising hell your own way. You only live once.  The Bandits Musical foundation was built with a blue collar approach from the ground up.  Their success is truely a result of hard work and doing things “their” way.

info.bio:
Kees Dieffenthaller began performing in the late 90's, fronting a cover band that specialized in Billboard chart-toppers, and popular soca and reggae tracks. Due to his vocal range, stage presence, good looks, and uncanny ability to mimic popular artists, Kees quickly created a buzz and attracted a large, loyal following. On the crest of all this success and momentum, Kees exited the cover band circuit in 2005 and formed his own band, KES, with the dream to pursue great original music. Featuring his brothers Hans (drums), Jon (lead guitar), and best friend Riad Boochoon (bass), Kees was now able to work with similarly focused members on creating original music that could have international appeal.

Since branching out on their own, Kes (the band) has managed to achieve significant success on a worldwide scale! For starters, the band has released several albums, (Three Baldheads & a Dread, Lion and On in Five), with more than a dozen tracks making it into the top 10 of major Caribbean charts. Additionally the band has won numerous awards for songwriting; toured globally, performed at major festivals and events in the United States, Canada and Germany; opened for acts such as Sean Paul, Musiq Soul Child, Usher, John Legend, and Rihanna; and had their music featured on television shows broadcast on MTV and BET, as well as licensed tracks to popular games on major video game platforms. 

In November 2007 Kees was flown to Nashville Tennessee to work with multiple Grammy Award Winner Desmond Child.  The song he co-wrote with Child was recorded by American Idol Ace Young and is featured on his self title album

Kes recently cut tracks with Maxi Priest and Aftermath signed artiste Bishop Lamont.  These are due for release later this year.  At the 2009 LA ASCAP Conference Kes was selected out of hundreds to perform at the showcase and left everyone clamoring to meet them.

Kes the band’s unique blend of soulful vocals and calypso-inspired melodies, over a fusion of rock riffs and island beats, hints of soca and reggae, can best be described as Caribbean Pop. This style has elevated Kes to stardom, allowing the band to become a household name in Trinidad & Tobago and throughout the Caribbean circuit including Miami, New York, Los Angeles, but also garnering attention from the mainstream market, where they consistently win over audiences with their electric and high-energy performances! 

The band recently wrapped three music videos for songs off their new Album; The songs are Stalker, My Girl and Till the Morning.  All three were Directed and Produced by a team comprising of Actor , Director and Writer Ty Hodges (Holes, Even Stevens,) Photographer and Director of Photography, Eric Curtis (www.ericcurtisphotography.com ) and Sheldon Felix, one of the top Trinidadian editors and Directors.


For more information check out: 
www.myspace.com/kestheband

In 11 years, This 5 angry young kids from BANDUNG City. Try to keep struggle in BANDUNG hardcore scene. YEAH Struggle never end to keep the faith in our root of OLDSKOOL STREET HARDCORE in BCHC. Starting out in midlle 1997 as 15/16-year old kids that wanted to play the music that their NYHC heroes had played in the early days of hardcore, UNDER18 gradually evolved to playing a unique style that is still mostly influenced by the original traditional NY hardcore raw sound such a the Legend WARZONE and LORD RAYBEEZ,and sound is AngryHC, Bandung City SKINHEAD Crew , Fast breaks,honnors attitude and Massive singalongs accompany the personal and tortured lyrics, what proved to move crowds on every show this band has played in a gigs in our hometown. Their brand of fast HARDCORE/PUNK and Oi! is quickly becoming a household name while inspiring kids all across the FLOWER CITY with there song such a BANDUNG BROTHERHOOD talk about relationship friend and unity all over scene and to mosh their bedrooms into disaster area such a brand new song LOYALITAS its talk about loyalist in a HARDCORE SCENE to send a message to the hardcore kid of what a new sound to come and go but our pride never faded to built the STREET HARDCORE/PUNK SCENE !!! and this here we're the band now has a solid lineup with:.. info.bio:
Peterpan shot from obscurity to stardom in 2000, becoming one of Indonesia's most popular and critically acclaimed bands of the decade. 

They're pushing the boundaries of what is considered "marketable" pop/rock music or reinventing their own sound, time and time again, Peterpan managed to embody the spirit of alternative rock while maintaining an international profile and a massive level of mainstream popularity.

info.bio:
A História da Banda
Referência no cenário musical potiguar, a Banda Grafith possui uma carreira de grande longevidade, comprometimento, experiência e convivência familiar. A Grafith, composta pelos quatro irmãos João Batista - conhecidos como Joãozinho, Luís Cláudio (Kaká), Júnior e Carlinhos -, possui marca registrada tanto no Rio Grande do Norte como em outros estados do Nordeste e vem conquistando fãs em grandes cidades e interiores com sucesso estável, bem como vem mantendo fielmente seus seguidores.
A carreira musical da família iniciou-se ainda na infância, quando Joãozinho resolveu "escapar" da severidade imposta pela educação militar do pai para expressar seu talento e paixão pela música. Passou a tocar guitarra e logo estava em contato com sua primeira experiência em apresentações musicais. Teve uma passagem rápida na banda Infernais, formado no bairro das Quintas, e logo se firmou na The Shinys como guitarrista e cantor, em 1974.

Com o despertar musical de Joãozinho, os outros irmãos, que também possuíam interesse pela música, decidiram seguir seus passos, sempre sendo questionados pelo pai, que tinha dúvidas se a música traria algum futuro e retorno financeiro para eles. Segundo os irmãos, o maior medo do pai era que os filhos acabassem possuindo algum vício, muito comum ao ambiente musical, o que não aconteceu.

Após a saída de Joãozinho do The Shinys, Luís Claúdio de Lima, o Kaká, foi chamado para substituir o irmão. Joãozinho passou a integrar o Suigeneris, com shows no Estado de São Paulo.

Enquanto o precursor Joãozinho se apresentava em programas de televisão, como o do Chacrinha, do Raul Gil, Clube do Bolinha e outros em São Paulo com o Suigeneres, seus irmãos Júnior, Kaká e Carlinhos integravam a banda os Impossíveis, começando, assim, a junção que formaria a futura banda que é sucesso até os dias de hoje.

Quando Joãozinho voltou a Natal em 1981, recusou o convite do Skema Livre e se juntou aos irmãos e o contrabaixista Jaílson na banda os Impossíveis. Essa nova formação durou até 1987 e, com sua ruptura, surgiu a Banda Grafith.

A banda recém-surgida mantinha o estilo de banda baile e, assim, conquistou fãs que se denominam "nação grafitheira". Novos ritmos foram aderidos, e a banda logo ficou reconhecida por sua diversidade, capacidade de adequação aos mais diversos ambientes - tocando em eventos como formaturas, casamentos, festas, carnaval e shows – e variedade de repertório. Por onde passa, Grafith arrasta multidões, sendo considerada banda "da massa", de todos os gostos e todas as classes sociais.

Com 23 anos de carreira, o grupo tem grande consideração e contato com seus fãs, além de manter sempre a humildade e o contato e apoio dos amigos e familiares, proporcionando, assim, o reconhecimento e o sucesso.

info.about: Official Fan Page grupe Lexington
info.band_members: Bojan Vasković, Miloš Vuksanović, Filip Krvavac, Dragoljub Stević, Dejan Krstić
info.bio:
Grupa Lexington počela je sa radom 2004. godine u Beogradu. Simbolika reči Lexington, uvek je bila oličenje glamura, elegancije i ozbiljnosti što i jeste imidž ove grupe. To je bio osnovni razlog da grupa nosi upravo ovo  ime. Interesantan deo priče je i da su svoj  prvi nastup imali u malom istoimenom lokalu. 

Nakon nekoliko godina stvaranja i bezuslovnog ulaganja, sve popularnija mlada grupa Lexington, izdala je svoj prvi album "Kako je tako je" koji sadrzi 12 pesama, za izdavacku kucu City Records.

Za vrlo kratko vreme, pesma sa istoimenog albuma "Kako je tako je", za koju je uradjen i visokobudzetni spot, postala je apsolutni hit kako na radio i TV stanicama tako i u klubovima.

Za pemu koja je otpevana u duetu sa poznatim kompozitorom i tekstopiscem, Banetom Opačićem, „Da me malo hoće“ je takođe urađen visokobudžetni spot, a na prestižnom Radijskom festivalu 2010. godine, ova grupa se našla rame uz rame, kao nosilac grupe, sa najvećim zvezdama muzičke scene.

Grupa Lexington se vec izdvojila kao jedan od najperspektivnijih sastava u Srbiji a saradjivali su i sa najeminentnijim autorima i muzičarima iz regiona.

Momci iz Beograda imaju velike ambicije a za uspeh će nastaviti da se bore dobrom pesmom i kvalitetnim pop zvukom.
info.name: Lexington Band

info.bio:
Triciclo Circus Band es un ensamble originado en el 2009 en la Ciudad de México, conformado por nueve músicos que se dan a la tarea de crear composiciones originales con un toque circense, basadas en estilos de música tradicional de diferentes países, entre los que se encuentran la polka, tango, manouche, vals, balcánico, oaxaqueña, paso doble, etc. Una de las principales inquietudes del grupo además de la música, es la interacción con la gente a fin de eliminar la barrera que existe entre el escenario y el público, por lo que la interdisciplina (performance, sketch) y el lenguaje visual (caracterización circense) son una parte fundamental del espectáculo, siendo la calle el principal laboratorio de improvisación y aprendizaje. Aunque su trayectoria es corta se han presentado en una gran diversidad de escenarios (teatros, centros culturales, festivales, auditorios, etc.), alternando con artistas reconocidos a nivel mundial. 

Triciclo Circus Band is an ensemble from Mexico city, originated in 2009, and made up of nine musicians which are given to the task to create original compositions based on different traditional music styles from around the globe, polka, tango, manouche, waltz, balkan, oaxaqueña, paso doble, etc. all of them with a touch of tent music. A main concern from the group, besides music, has always been the audience interaction in order to eliminate the stage-audience barrier, therefore the interdisciplinary side (performance, sketch) and the visual language (circus characterization), are an essential part of the show, making the streets their main improvisation and learning laboratory. Despite their short career they've been performing in a wide variety of venues (theaters, cultural centers, festivals, auditoriums, etc.), alternating with world-renowned artists. 

Triciclo Circus Band est un groupe crée en 2009 à Mexico, composé de neuf musiciens qui se plaisent à créer des compositions originales inspirées de l'univers du cirque, basées sur des styles de musiques traditionnelles de différents pays, parmi lesquels polka, tango, manouche, valse, paso doble, Balkans, Oaxaca, etc. L'une des préoccupations principales du groupe, en plus de la musique, est l'interaction avec les personnes afin de rapprocher la scène et le public car la variété des disciplines (performance, comédie) et le langage visuel (univers du cirque) sont des éléments essentiels du spectacle, en faisant de la rue le principal laboratoire d'improvisation et d'apprentissage. Bien que sa carrière soit courte le groupe a joué dans une grande variété de représentations (théâtres, centres culturels, festivals, auditoriums, etc.) alternant avec des artistes de renommée mondiale. 

Triciclo Circus Band ist ein Ensemble bestehend aus neun Musikern, das sich 2009 in Mexiko-Stadt formierte. Die Musiker verstehen sich auf Originalkompositionen mit einem Hauch von Zirkus, die auf traditionellen Musikstilen verschiedener Länder, u.a. Polka, Manouche, Tango, Walzer, Paso Doble, basieren. Eines der wichtigsten Anliegen der Gruppe ist neben der Musik die Interaktion mit den Zuhörern, um die Barriere zwischen Bühne und Publikum aufzuheben. Deshalb sind die Interaktion (Performance, Sketch) und die Bildsprache (Zirkuselemente) ein wesentlicher Teil der Show, wobei die Straße als primärer Ort der Präsentation, Improvisation und des Lernens gilt. Obwohl die Band erst seit kurzem besteht, präsentierte sie sich bereits auf einer Vielzahl von Szenarien (Theater, Kulturzentren, Festivals, etc.), manchmal gemeinsam mit weltbekannten Künstlern.
info.genre: ... Basicamente, una Banda de 9 musicos con narices rojas aderezada con un toque de magia citadina, un poco de folk del mundo, tarantela, polkas, gypsy, valses franceses, pasodobles, danzon, tango, musica clown, manoush, etc, etc, etc...

info.bio:
Pertama berdiri tahun 1996, tepatnya pada tanggal 30 September. Awalnya sekelompok pemuda terdiri dari Aldonny, Heru, Dicky dan Hendra mencoba turut menyuarakan kepedihan mereka terhadap kehidupan. Dengan nama Mutant X mereka membawakan lagu lagu band kesukaan mereka. Seiring dengan perjalanan waktu mereka merasa nama Mutant X kurang Indonesia. Akhirnya terpilihlah JERUJI sebagai nama yang mewakili mereka pada saat dipanggil ke atas panggung.

Perjalanan karier Jeruji meniti arus naik turun dan pahit manisnya panggung ke panggung. Hingga pada akhirnya mereka diajak terlibat dalam satu kompilasi klasik yang bertajuk Bandung’s Burning pada tahun 1997 yang diproduksi oleh Riotic Recs dengan single No Really Competitions. Masih pada tahun yang sama Jeruji menerima ajakan untuk terlibat dalam satu kompilasi yang di produksi oleh label Tian An Men ..89 Recs dari Perancis dan masuklah single Pianjingeun pada kompilasi yang dirilis dalam bentuk piringan hitam ukuran 7 inci dan beredar di Perancis dan negara Eropa lainnya secara independen.

Pada tahun 1998 setelah sekitar 2 tahun mencoba dari panggung ke panggung underground scene di Indonesia akhirnya Jeruji menelurkan album perdananya secara independen dengan judul Freedom yang dirilis oleh 41 Recs Bandung. Pada tahun yang sama juga kompilasi Brain Beverages dirilis dan single Broken adalah lagu Jeruji yang terlibat didalam kompilasi yang dirilis oleh Harder Recs Bandung.

Ternyata gaung Jeruji sampai juga ke negara Matahari Terbit dan sebuah records company bernama All System Fail merilis kembali kompilasi yang berisi single Pianjingeun bekerja sama dengan Tian An Men ..89 Recs dalam bentuk compact disc dan dirilis pada tahun 1999. Di dalam negeri sendiri Jeruji ternyata concern dengan tidak adanya skatepark yang representatif untuk para skateboarder bermain. Seiring dengan ide itu Jeruji diajak oleh ISA (Indonesian Skateboarding Association) dan Spills Records untuk membuat kompilasi yang keuntungannya diperuntukan pada pembuatan Skatepark. Single Drunk With Power menjadi salah satu lagu yang ada dalam A Ticket To Ride “benefit for local skatepark” yang dirilis oleh Spills Records.

Pada tahun 2000 Jeruji berubah formasi dan memutuskan untuk menambah personel sebagai bagian dari dinamisnya musik Jeruji. Robby mengisi posisi gitar dan memberi nafas baru bagi Jeruji. Dan pada tahun ini juga album Lawan dirilis oleh Napi Recs. Perjalanan panggung Jeruji ternyata tidak berhenti, tetapi malah semakin banyak dan mendewasakan masing masing personelnya.

Ide pembuatan live recording yang melibatkan penonton secara langsung memang belum ada waktu itu di Indonesia ternyata menarik untuk beberapa pihak. Dan akhirnya terwujud sudah dan melibatkan beberapa band pionir dan label independen di Bandung. Dengan tajuk 4 Harvest Live Recording Jeruji bersama dengan Puppen, Forgotten dan Blind To See melakukan pertunjukan yang direkam secara live di Dago Tea House indoor pada tahun 2001 yang rencananya akan dirilis dalam bentuk kaset, CD dan VCD.

Pada akhir tahun 2003, formasi terakhir Jeruji yaitu Aldonny ”Themfuck”, Heru, Robby, Sanny dan Opick telah merampungkan materi lagu untuk album yang ketiga. Setelah melalui proses negosiasi dan sign kontrak dengan salah satu label rekaman independen, akhirnya pada bulan Agustus 2004 album mereka yang diberi nama 3rd berhasil dirilis secara eksklusif oleh Subciety Records. Album tersebut berisikan 13 lagu dengan materi dan nuansa yang sangat berbeda dari album mereka sebelumnya. Sebagai pemanasan bagi skena bawah tanah di Indonesia, Jeruji baru saja merampungkan video klip untuk Single Lawan. Namun setelah identitas diri mereka mulai tumbuh di dalam sebuah komunitas yang cukup solid di Bandung, akhirnya Jeruji harus ditinggalkan oleh salah satu gitarisnya yaitu Heru dan sementara untuk mengisi kekosongannya posisi tersebut digantikan oleh Ayi sebagai additional. Line-up tersebut tidak bertahan lama karena Ayi mundur kemudian Robby sempat minta ijin cuti untuk menikah, lalu masuk Badik dan Robby kembali main gitar sampai akhirnya Robby mengalami kecelakan yg cukup parah. Ale dari Full of Hate kemudian masuk menggantikan, hingga sekarang.

info.bio:
Originaria del poblado de Mesillas Concordia, Sinaloa, la BANDA SAN JOSE DE MESILLAS hace 20 años inició un camino en la música, dirigido hacia el éxito; esto acontecía un 19 de marzo de 1990, adoptando la música de banda como propia. 
Ahora, la experiencia adquirida por cada uno de sus integrantes a lo largo de estos años es clara, logrando que su estilo contagie al público en todas sus presentaciones.
Su primer producción discográfica fue Es Falsa Compañero, le siguió Aunque Sea a Escondidas, Alma de Acero, Tu Destino, Si Te Tengo a Ti, Intocable, Para Conquistarte, En Que Te Falle, estas producciones se han realizado en Los Mochis, Sinaloa, donde graban las principales bandas de México.
BANDA SAN JOSE DE MESILLAS presenta su Novena propuesta musical que nace bajo el titulo de Como La Palma de Mi Mano. El álbum esta conformado por 15 temas,con el tradicional sonido de la banda de viento y el toque característico que le dan sus integrantes, en el cual podemos encontrar temas a ritmo de cumbia, balada, bolero y corrido.
Como La Palma de Mi Mano fue el primer sencillo a promocionar, con excelentes resultados, teniendo como consecución el tema PORQUE SIN TI siendo un tema romántico, inédito de la inspiración de Juan Carlos González el cual se pone en sus manos y en las del publico para seguir con su ascendente trayectoria.
info.name: Banda San Jose de Mesillas

info.bio:
Más que un grupo, Banda Conmoción es un colectivo, dieciocho músicos que gozan tocando en medio de la gente y sobre el escenario. En sus presentaciones no es raro verlos bajar con sus instrumentos, tocando mientras se acomodan entre el público, ahí todo se convierte en un delirante carnaval, una gran fiesta en medio del cemento. La Banda Conmoción es una tropa, una familia que toca junta hace 10 años, y tal vez por eso es que en lugar de discos, sólo han dejado recuerdos para quienes tuvieron la suerte de estar ahí. Partieron el año 2001 como proyecto musical paralelo a los montajes de Teatro Mendicantes, siguieron su recorrido en matrimonios, bautizos y funerales, antes de llegar a los escenarios (año 2005).

Lo suyo es el formato instrumental del tambo nortino, las fiestas de pueblo,la cumbia, el porro, las cuyahuadas, el vals, el bolero, el San juanito, diríamos que esta gran Banda a formado sus cimientos en su amor a la música de nuestra Latinoamérica y hace unos años han incluido repertorio de la música gitana, Así lo han hecho, extendiendo y difundiendo esta música con la energía que los caracteriza, , todo mezclado, como si fueran la banda sonora de una salitrera aún en funcionamiento. La Banda Conmocion en estos años ha compartido escenario con artistas como Manka Saya, Arak Pacha, Mauricio Redoles, Manuel Sanchez, Alfonso Rubio, Los Mentaos, Los trukeros, Escuela Chinchin tirapie, Juana Fe, La Mano Ajena, Chico Trujillo, La Floripondio, Fiskales Ad Hok, Los Miserables, Patogallina Saundmachin, Sonora Palacios, Sinergia, Anita Tijoux, Escaso Aporte, Sonora de Llegar, Sol y Lluvia, Francesca Ancarola, José Seves, Banda Fuerza Maestra, Banda Proyección, La todo mal orquesta, Es Comediant, entre varios.
 
Son diez años de desplazamiento promoviendo una sonoridad que no necesita del suministro eléctrico y que ha permitido a la Banda Conmoción llegar a diversos parajes, otorgando una experiencia que se plasma en su primer trabajo de estudio bautizado como “Sonido Esencial”. Tinkus, cha-cha-cha, cumbias y ritmos gitanos, escuchados en las bandas instrumentales peruanas, bolivianas y los papayeros de Colombia, además de las fanfarrias gitanas de la región de los Balcanes son las influencias de las que se nutre.
info.influences: Espectaculares Amautas, Pagador de Oruro, Mike Laure, Pedro Laza, Gaiteros de San Jacinto, James Brown, Tito Puente, Tomy Rey, Jacques Brel, Fanfare Ciocarlia, Kocani Orchestar, Goran Bregovic, Los Charros de Lumaco, The Clash, La Huambaly, Los corraleros de Majagual, Alfredo Gutierres.
info.name: Banda Conmoción

info.description:
The Band

“Daddy’s Cash” is the result of a long-lasting relationship between students Michał and Jedrzej and their music instructors Wojtek and Lukasz. This remarkable band has been influenced by a number of factors: on one hand by ambitious students, their respect for the art of music and willingness to develop their musical skills; on the other hand – a huge array of experience, the highest level of professionalism, and an openness by the teachers towards the creative spirit of their students. These, combined with endless hours of practice, were the foundation for the first collaborative concert of teachers and students.
The beginnings, however, were not easy. The band, which did not publicly perform at the time, frequently changed members and invited different musicians to cooperate with them. At long last, “Daddy’s Cash” has been established with the following band members:

    Maciej Gruchacz - guitar
    Radoslaw Dzielski – guitar
    Krzysztof Czerkawski – guitar
    Milosz Skwirut – bass
    Marcin Dyjak – harmonica
    Wojciech Inglot – electric piano, organ
    Michał Jasiczek - alto saxophone, tenor saxophone
    Szymon Bobrowski – trumpet
    Michal Borowski – trombone
    Jedrzej Jasiczek – drums
    Lukasz Wiercioch – percussion instruments

The band explored a wide variety of music styles – from Blues and Rock to Jazz. Finally, they found their own style in traditional Grassroots Blues.
info.name: Daddy's Cash

info.description:
Mekaal Hasan Band (MHB) was formed in 2001 by guitarist/composer Mekaal Hasan.The music that MHB plays is a fusion between the melodic sensibility of the East and the harmonic sophistication of the West. 

Mekaal Hasan Band features the artistry of musicians from Pakistan and abroad, and with fellow bandmates Mohd. Ahsan Papu on flute, Amir Azhar on bass, and featuring Javed Bashir on vocals, The Mekaal Hasan Band is continuing to explore this exciting blend of East and West, in a series of live performances, studio recordings and videos that are drawing music enthusiasts in large numbers. 

MHB is Pakistan's most critically acclaimed act as well, winning numerous awards and nominations for it's recordings, videos and live performances.

Nama Baru Peterpan adalah NOAH BAND. Para mantan personel Peterpan Ariel, Uki, Lukman, David, dan Reza mengumumkan nama barunya, Noah Band.

Logo Noah Band dengan gambar bulu pada bagian tengah huruf A. Bulu ini kini tampak menanjak ke atas. Bulu tersebut bermakna sebagai bagian yang indah pada Noah yang bisa membuat penggemarnya melayang saat mendengar lagu Noah. Bak bulu pada burung yang bisa membuat terbang tinggi.

Bulu yang menghadap ke atas bermakna bahwa karir Noah akan selalu lebih baik dari kemarin. Meski banyak rintangan dan halangan dilalui.
Nama baru Peterpan ini dirilis resmi di kantor Musica di kawasan Pancoran, Jakarta, Kamis 2 Agustus 2012. Nama baru ini menurut vokalis NOAH, Ariel, disiapkan kurang lebih dua tahun setengah karena banyaknya pilihan nama.Pada kesempatan yang sama, Noah juga mengumumkan nama single terbarunya berjudul “Separuh Aku” . Lagu ini diciptaan David.

info.bio:
Kevin Vásquez
Kevin Ricardo Vásquez Villanueva, cantante, actor de televisión, compositor y productor musical Chileno. Su carrera actoral y musical se inicia a la edad de 13 años en 2007, obteniendo uno de los personajes protagónicos, interpretando a “Kevin Gálvez” en la exitosa serie de televisión Amango de canal 13.
Teniendo un rotundo éxito con 3 temporadas y dos álbumes con disco de platino (Amango: El sueño se hizo Realidad y Amango: Esto no es un juego), “Amango” en Febrero del 2008 es convocado al Festival de Viña del Mar como artista invitado, ganando La Antorcha de Plata y la ovación del público. Desde ese momento, Kevin fue nombrado como “La Voz de Amango”.
 
En el 2009 interpretó un papel de artista invitado en la teleserie de canal 13, “Corazón Rebelde” participando en 4 Capítulos como “Key-B” .

Desde fines del 2009 hasta principios del 2011, Kevin,  busca refugio en la música componiendo y aprendiendo a producirla, siendo uno de los productores más jóvenes de Chile. Crea Kevin Karla & La Banda junto a su hermana Karla Vásquez(protagonista de la Teleserie Gordis), teniendo éxito rotundo en Internet con sus covers en Español, alcanzando cerca de 5 millones de visitas en Meses.
Luego de casi 2 años fuera de la Televisión, en enero del 2011, firma con Chilevisión para ser parte del exitoso programa juvenil: Yingo, siendo el ganador de un auto en la temporada Guerra de los Sexos. 
Poco tiempo después Kevin deja ‘Yingo’ para dedicarse 100% a su pasión: Escribir, componer y producir Música. Sus trabajos más recientes como Autor, compositor, arreglador y productor musical,  han sido trabajar para Eyci & Cody  siendo el responsable de “Here with me” ( Canción N°1 en Ranking Musical de la Radio Emisora “Hit 40”) y para Raquel Calderón, Produciendo “Walk Away”,  Tema Central del Docureality “Las Argandoña”.
info.description:
Karla Vásquez 

Karla Elizabeth Vásquez Villanueva nació el 19 de agosto en Santiago de Chile. Hija de Ricardo Vásquez y Magaly Villanueva, quienes siempre la guiaron por el camino de la música, a ella y a sus dos hermanos menores, Kevin y Kenneth. Karla a muy temprana edad manifestó su gusto por la música, la actuación y el canto, siendo este último, la herramienta que utilizaría para entrar al mundo de la televisión. A la edad de 5 años, empezó a hacer sus primeras apariciones en público masivo, en donde interpretaba canciones cristianas en los eventos donde se presentaba. Más tarde tuvo el agrado de pisar grandes escenarios, como el Teatro Caupolicán, Estadio Nacional y el Movistar Arena compartiendo éste con el gran cantante cristiano Marcos Witt.
A los 12 años, comenzó a presentarse a los casting Infantiles de los programas de televisión, en donde si bien en ese tiempo eran escasos, quedó seleccionada en dos de ellos. (Bravo Bravissimo, Buenos Días a Todos y Con Ustedes). Luego a la edad de 18 años, viajó a Buenos Aires, Argentina para presentarse en el programa Latin American Idol.
Después de un descanso, en donde comenzó a estudiar en la Universidad, se presenta la posibilidad de probar suerte en el programa juvenil de Chilevisión: Yingo, temporada que fue denominada “Las estrellas del futuro”. Pasado un mes y medio de dicha competencia, el programa da un giro y se queda con 8 de sus 20 participantes, en donde vuelve a ser un programa de entretención. Karla, fue una de las seleccionadas para seguir en el programa junto a su hermano Kevin, en donde formaron parte del Elenco hasta principios del año 2012. En medio de la competencia “Estrellas del futuro”, Karla es convocada por el director del programa, Alex Hernández, para participar en la serie juvenil de dicho canal, en el horario de las 20 hrs. Fue así como Karla debutó en la actuación, obteniendo el papel protagónico de la teleserie Gordis en dónde le dio vida  a “Amelia” e interpretó  4 de las 5 canciones principales de la banda sonora inédita: “Por tu amor”, “Dulce Caramelo”, “Yo soy asi”   ( versión electro y versión acústica) . 
En conjunto con su trabajo en Televisión, Karla comenzó junto a Kevin, a trabajar en sus proyectos musicales, desarrollándose como autores, compositores e intérpretes.  Es así como nace “Kevin, Karla y la Banda” , Dúo Chileno, quienes se caracterizan por hacer Covers de Artistas internacionales, traducidos a Español, siendo los Jóvenes Chilenos más escuchados por Internet (Youtube) en Chile y Latinoamérica, con cerca de 5 millones de Visitas.
info.name: Kevin,Karla y La Banda

info.bio:
Awal terbentuknya band kami mulai dari sebuah sekolah menengah tingkat atas. Dari sekadar bersenda gurau, lalu meningkat pada intensitas pertemuan, kemudian lahirlah sebuah ide untuk membentuk sebuah band dengan nama Seven Rastaman

Lazimnya pertumbuhan sebuah band, kami pun mengalami perombakan personil. Seiring tambal sulam personil, maka pada tanggal 29 Desember 2009  kami tentukan sebuah nama baru untuk mewakili kami ber 5 , yaitu Pasir Pantai

Pemilihan nama tersebut bagi para kami tidak memiliki arti yang sangat khusus. Penggunaan nama Pasir Pantai bagi kami lebih simpel, gampang disebut dan diingat 

kami beranggapan bahwa pasir di pantai melambangkan sebuah hubungan yang saling mengenal satu sama lainnya yang berasal dari semua golongan. Kesemua itu, bagi kami merupakan sebuah nilai yang tak terhingga.

Band yang berdomisili di bagian selatan Kota Jakarta ini beranggotakan Leso (vokal), Kinoy (rhythm), Danni (lead), Yugo (bass), dan Ryan (drum). dan muncul Mega (keyboard) . Serta dibantu oleh beberapa pemain additional, yaitu Juri (Perkusi), Selva (vokal)

Kami berharap dapat menjadi band yang berkembang lebih baik, maju, sukses, dan dapat memberikan kesan terdalam bagi semua golongan. Sehingga setiap orang yang menyaksikan performansi Kami dapat terhibur, baik secara live maupun dengan mendengarkan via perangkat audio.

Penilaian masyarakat atas respon karya-karya kami merupakan dorongan semangat para personil untuk terus berkarya. Dorongan tersebut diibaratkan seperti ombak yang selalu menggerakkan butiran pasir di pantai ,

Seiring pertumbuhannya, alhamdulillah kini kami sudah memiliki 5 buah single. berkat doa orang tua dan kalian semua sahabat sahabat yang sudah dukung kami dari awal sampai saat ini, Terimakasih bradsist
info.description:
Berkat rahmat Tuhan Yang Maha Esa PASIR PANTAI telah menghasilkan karya nya, dan ini adalah beberapa lagu yang menjadi karya PASIR PANTAI

1. PASIR PANTAIi song = menceritakan sebuah band yang diibaratkan pasir di pantai yang bergerak di dorong ombak namun tetap dalam satu kesatuan

2. SAYANG = seseorang kekasih yang sangat meyesal telah meninggal kan dan menyia nyiakan

3. SUSU KOPIi = perbedaan itu ada

4. JAKARTA KOTA MIMPI = betapa keras nya hidup di jakarta, yang penuh dengan angan angan

5. FALLIN IN LOVE = cinta pandangan pertama seorang pria, da ingin wanita menerima dia apa adanya

info.description: Bread was a rock band from Los Angeles, California. They placed 13 songs on the Billboard Hot 100 chart between 1970 and 1977 and were a prime example of what later was labeled soft rock.The band consisted of David Gates (vocals, guitar, bass, keyboards, violin, viola, percussion), Jimmy Griffin (vocals, guitar, keyboards, percussion), Robb Royer (bass, guitar, flute, keyboards, percussion, recorder, backing vocals), Mike Botts (drums; joined in the summer of 1969) and Larry Knechtel (bass, guitar, keyboards, harmonica; replaced Royer in 1971).Beginnings and fameBefore forming Bread, Gates had worked with Royer's previous band, The Pleasure Fair, producing and arranging the band's 1967 album, The Pleasure Fair. Royer then introduced Gates to his songwriting partner, Griffin, and the trio joined together in 1968 and signed with Elektra Records, choosing the name "Bread" in 1969. The group's first single, "Dismal Day", was released in June 1969 but did not chart. Their debut album, Bread, was released in September 1969 and peaked at No. 127 on the Billboard 200. Songwriting on the album was split evenly between Gates and the team of Griffin-Royer. Jim Gordon, a session musician, accompanied the band on drums for the album.
info.name: Bread (band)

info.bio:
The iconic and profoundly influential Nitty Gritty Dirt Band, often cited as a catalyst for an entire movement in Country Rock and American Roots Music, continues to add to their legendary status. 

With multi-platinum and gold records, strings of top ten hits such as "Fishin' In The Dark" and "Mr. Bojangles", multiple Grammy, IBMA, CMA Awards and nominations, the band's accolades continue to accumulate.

Their groundbreaking "Will The Circle Be Unbroken" album has been inducted into the U.S. Library of Congress as well as the Grammy Hall of Fame.  NGDB’s recording of "Mr. Bojangles" was also inducted into the Grammy Hall of Fame in 2010.

NGDB (Jeff Hanna, Jimmie Fadden, Bob Carpenter, John McEuen) are touring in support of their most recent release, the critically acclaimed album "Speed of Life" (2009, SugarHill Records) with recent tour stops at Bonnaroo and Levon Helm's Midnight Ramble.

info.bio:
KanGen Band merupakan grup musik yang dibentuk di Lampung pada tahun 2005. Meski terbilang sebagai pendatang baru, namun band yang personilnya terdiri dari Dodhy, Andika, Tama, Iim, Bebe, dan Izzy itu mendapat sambutan hangat dari masyarakat.

Album perdana KanGen Band adalah TENTANG AKU, KAU, DAN DIA (2007). Dalam album tersebut terdapat lagu Tentang Bintang, Tentang Aku, Kau, dan Dia, Jika, Selingkuh, Karma, Penantian Yang Tertunda, Bidadariku Surgaku, Adakah Jawabnya, Petualang Cinta, dan Menunggu.

Lagu populernya adalah Tentang Bintang dan Selingkuh yang menjadi hits populer di masyarakat. Kedua lagu tersebut juga populer menjadi nada sela dan RBT (Ring Back Tone). Bahkan di ajang SCTV Award, KanGen Band berhasil masuk sebagai Grup Band Terfavorit.

Selang setahun kemudian, KanGen Band langsung merilis 2 album sekaligus. YANG SEMPURNA, yang merupakan repackage dari album perdananya, dan album BINTANG 14 HARI, yang menjagokan lagu Doy, Bintang 14 Hari, dan Yolanda.

Belakangan, kisah perjalanan karir KanGen Band yang diawali dari pedagang kaki lima diangkat sebagai sinetron, dengan judul AKU MEMANG KAMPUNGAN (2007). Debut bermain sinetron berlanjut di AKU MEMANG JELEK dan KASIHANILAH AKU.

Pada 6 Mei 2009, KanGen Band merilis album ketiga yang berjudul PUJAAN HATI, dengan hits single Terbang Bersamaku dan Pujaan Hati, dan Nilailah Aku. Selain itu, KanGen Band juga bakal merilis album versi karaoke.

Dari musik dan sinetron, KanGen Band menjelajah layar lebar. KanGen Band dilibatkan oleh Noe Letto, dalam film yang ia produseri sendiri yaitu, MINGGU PAGI DI VICTORIA PARK. Film ini sendiri disutradarai oleh Lola Amaria.

Dan sekarang KanGen Band sudah mengeluarkan album keempatnya yang berjudul JANGAN BERTENGKAR.



***************************************************



Pendapat orang-orang tentang KanGen Band :

-Frans Sartono, Wartawan Kompas :
"KanGen Band muncul dari komunitas rakyat jelata. Kehadiran KanGen Band menjadi indikator bahwa demokratisasi bermusik tumbuh di negeri ini.."

-Yenny Yudica, Program Silet, RCTI :
"Lirik dan lagu yang KanGen Band ciptakan mampu membungkam para pencemooh.."

-Febry Meuthia, Produser Program Musik, SCTV :
"KanGen Band masih sebagai band yang diminati oleh masyarakat, terbukti dengan rating dan respon masyarakat yang tinggi.."

-Zurdalis Elfira, Eksekutif Produser Insert, Trans Tv :
"KanGen Band tampil apa adanya sehingga mereka begitu lepas dalam berkreasi.."

-Rahayu Kertawiguna, Presiden Direktur Nagaswara Music & Publishing :
"KanGen Band adalah salah satu pelopor musik pop melayu modern dan sudah boleh menyandang julukan sebagai raja Pop Melayu.."

-Radjasa Tri Adisukma, General Manager Universal Music Indonesia :
"Mereka datang untuk mewujudkan mimpi, dicerca, dipertanyakan oleh yang tidak mengerti, tetapi hingga kini lebih banyak yang mencintai.."

-Jusak Irwan Sutiono, Managing Director, Warner Music Indonesia :
"Perkembangan musikalitas album pertama hingga ketiga KanGen Band mengalami banyak kemajuan yang cukup signifikan.."

info.bio: En la música regional mexicana, Stacks es el nuevo artista con mayor proyección en la musica de banda… viene con todo! (Fragmentos del tema( HOLA CORAZON ) …HOLA CORAZON COMO ESTAS REGALAME UN MINUTO DE TU TIEMPO TRAIGO EN MI PECHO UN SENTIMIENTO K ME DESLUNBRA Y NO QUIERO VOLVER A LA TRISTE Y CRUEL SOLEDAD.Este tema es el preferido en los ipod’s y las descargas a celulares.Esto queda demostrado con cientos de miles de visitas al INTERNET por día gracias a STACKS, los métodos tradicionales de promoción de música viven una revolución del 180%. No hay duda. En el 2012, STACKS será declarado por el público como REVELACION DEL AÑO. Es un artista que viene a quedarse,Stacks empezó grabando rap en ingles pero siempre tuvo la inquietud de cantar musica de banda pero no fue asta principios del 2010 que se avienta por completo a este genero de musica acompañado por su banda la consentida gravaron la cancion y primer censillo cual lleva por nombre "HOLA CORAZON" esta cancion alcanso los primeros lugares de popularidad en la radio compitiendo con las grandes agrupasiones.El cuenta con un gran apoyo de varias agrupaciones y cantantes como lo es LARRY HERNANDEZ,PATRULLA 81,MONTEZ DE DURANGO,LA ARROLLADORA BANDA LIMON,ESPINOZA PAZ,por nombrar algunos.Este 2011 se dio a la tarea de reclutar nuevos artistas que como el train su propio estilo y asi dando vida al MOVIMIENTO PROGRESIVO MICHOACANO no cave duda que este jovensito de Dallas Tx. no para de darnos sorpresas por eso es el CREADOR DEL ESTILO PROGRESIVO.

info.band_members: Os componentes são, Samuel(Baterista e Produtor Musical), Jedson(Vocalista e Compositor), Deison(Acordeon), Isaias Passarinho(Teclado), Marigeson(Baixo), Alexandre(Guitarra)
info.description:
BANDA SOM & LOUVOR
                                         
                                          O Verdadeiro Som do Louvor

A Banda Som e Louvor surgiu há cerca de 25 anos, na igreja Assembléia de Deus em Jacundá- PA , com músicos que hoje são pais de alguns dos músicos atuais, e outros que faziam parte da igreja. Hoje os componentes são, Samuel(Baterista e Produtor Musical), Jedson(Vocalista e Compositor), Deison(Acordeon), isaias passarinho(Teclado), Marigerson(Baixo), Alexandre(Guitarra). Em 2005, iniciou-se a gravação do primeiro CD, com estilo inovador no meio Gospel, o forró, que é criticado por muitos, mas abençoado por Deus. Já ouvimos muito falar de que o diabo é o pai do rock, reggae do forró quem disse? A única coisa de que ele é pai, é da mentira ( Jó 8.44). Por acaso, foi ele quem criou os instrumentos musicais? É bíblico: 'tudo quanto tem fôlego, louve ao Senhor'. Sendo assim, a Banda Som e Louvor não podiam deixar de atender ao chamado de Deus. Por isso, não deu atenção às palavras destrutivas, muito menos se importou com a resistência dos mais ?tradicionais?, que custaram a aceitar o som da turma por puro preconceito. No mês de Maio de 2006 ele começou a se realizar, com o lançamento do primeiro CD, intitulado Sinal Fechado. Com este CD, os músicos perceberam que Deus estava os provando, mas também abençoando e dando vitórias a cada dia. A emoção, unção e sentimentos transmitidos em suas canções são universais e mexem com o coração do santo Israel de Deus espalhado pela face da terra. Até mesmo os não evangélicos e não seguidores da palavra de Deus se emocionam quando escutam os louvores, que saem dos lábios e instrumentos da Banda Som e Louvor. Seja onde forem, igrejas, congressos, casas de espetáculos, festas missionárias, a recepção é sempre a mesma. Suas músicas falam do imenso amor de Deus, do cuidado que ele tem para com seus filhos, e de como precisamos crer nele para alcançarmos a vitória. No ano de 2007, nasceu um novo projeto nos corações dos componentes da Banda Som & Louvor, e com muita oração e intercessão O projeto ?Regravações? começa a tomar ?corpo? com uma seleção detalhada de repertorio, e em 2008, a Banda lança o Cd ?Usei a Fé? Com as 3 musicas mais tocadas em algumas regiões do Brasil, e as 3 musicas mais baixadas da internet no seguimento Gospel. A Banda se prepara para o LANÇAMENTO DO MAIS NOVO CD em 2009 (É HOJE). A Banda pede a oração dos irmãos em Cristo e a direção de Deus, para conduzi-la nessa jornada de levar Sua palavra a todos que precisam ouvir.
info.name: Banda Som e Louvor (Oficial)

info.description: Panda es una banda mexicana de pop punk y rock alternativo, originaria de Monterrey, formada en 1996.Su género ha sido diverso pasando por el pop punk en sus dos primeros discos Arroz con leche y La revancha del príncipe charro, haciendo cambios en su tercer disco, Para ti con desprecio, en el cual sigue la evolución de la banda con letras políticas y más dramáticas que las que se vieron en los discos anteriores. Los cambios emocionales en las canciones de los últimos álbumes derivaron en temas como la tristeza y decepción.HistoriaComienzosSe forma en 1996 en Nuevo Leon, Monterrey, su primera alineación estuvo compuesta por Jose Madero Jorge Garza , Ricardo Treviño y David Castillo . Luego de ensayos y varias presentaciones Castillo abandona la banda siendo reemplazado por el entonces baterista de Super Azfalto, Jorge Vazquez mejor conocido como Kross. Ya con esta formacion graban un demo en 1997.2000-2004: Arroz con leche y La revancha del príncipe charroEn el año 2000, sale a la venta su primer álbum titulado Arroz con leche. No fue hasta el 2002 con su segundo álbum La revancha del príncipe charro que saltaron a la fama y debido a la respuesta de más y más seguidores hacen una reedición del primer álbum Arroz Con leche esta vez con un VCD con todos sus vídeos musicales.
info.name: Panda

info.description: The Gaither Vocal Band is an American southern gospel vocal group, named after its founder and leader Bill Gaither. Since 2009, it consists of David Phelps and Wes Hampton (tenors), Michael English (lead), Mark Lowry (baritone), and Bill Gaither (bass). Although the group started out recording contemporary Christian music, it became known for southern gospel after the popularity of the Gaither Homecoming videos.The lineup of the band changes often, with artists leaving to work on solo careers, and new ones coming to replace them. Besides Bill Gaither, singers with the longest tenure in the band include Guy Penrod (1995–2008), Mark Lowry (1988–2001, 2009–present), and Michael English (1985–94, 2009–present).The band has released 27 albums (not including compilations), at least 19 of which have charted. The band has also released 10 DVDs, which feature many other Christian artists as well. The Gaither Vocal Band has been honored with 2 Grammys, and 16 Dove Awards.HistoryBeginningsThe Gaither Vocal Band is named after gospel legend and leader, Bill Gaither. It was the successor-group of the Bill Gaither Trio. By the 1980s, Bill Gaither, along with wife Gloria Gaither, were both very successful songwriters. For example, their song, "He Touched Me" was covered by Elvis Presley, after which he even named his album He Touched Me. Presley won a Grammy for the album. Bill Gaither felt that his trio had reached its peak in the mid-1980s, but his desire to make another gospel hit kept the trio going.
info.name: Gaither Vocal Band

info.bio:
Sus inicios se remontan al mes de Febrero del año 2010, en la ciudad de Mazatlán en el Estado Sinaloa México, gracias al entusiasmo y el amor por la música de Banda Sinaloense, 17 jóvenes movidos por el deseo de ser partícipes de hacer algo diferente, se proponen como meta el integrar una banda, en donde puedan plasmar su personalidad en cuanto a la interpretación de la música sinaloense, y es de donde toman la idea de denominarla "La Poderosa Banda San Juan" ya que este nombre se debe a que refleja las ganas que tienen todos sus integrantes de triunfar.

Tras el paso entre diferentes agrupaciones les permite tener algunos años de experiencia,  sus metas y objetivos son claros, ya que saben que para llegar a entrar en el gusto de la gente,  además de interpretar bien la música de banda sinaloense, es necesario incluir y sugerir temas nuevos en su repertorio y tener su propio estilo.

Tras casi más de un año de trabajar arduamente en fiestas, teatros de Pueblo, ferias y en eventos en los alrededores de Mazatlán, han empezado a lograr lo que pocos, sobresalir entre las demás bandas locales y ser reconocidos gracias a su trabajo y estilo. Actualmente se preparan para lanzar su primer material discográfico titulado “Malo Corazón” bajo la producción del Lic. Fernando Camacho ganador del Latin Grammy 2011, compuesto por 13 temas entre rancheras, baladas, cumbias y románticas de donde se desprende su primer sencillo “Si Ella Supiera", de la autoría de Luis Gerardo Padilla Riojas, tema que actualmente se escucha en las principales estaciones de radio en México.

Banda San Juan agradece a Dios, a sus familias y sobre todo a ustedes su público por la oportunidad que les dan de poder hacer lo que más les gusta, así como la confianza, apoyo y cariño.
info.name: La Poderosa Banda San Juan

info.bio:
PERSONAL
Dari ajang THE DREAM BAND yang diadakan oleh salah satu televisi swasta pada tahun 2004 silam, Kotak terlahir lewat tangan Dody Isnaini, salah satu personil Kahitna, yang menjabat sebagai produser. Dody lah yang itu melakukan audisi untuk membentuk format band baru yang terdiri atas drummer, gitaris, bassis, dan vokalis. 

Pada tanggal 27 September 2004 terbentuklah Kotak dengan format Pare (vokal), Prinzes Amanda/Icez (bass), Mario Marsella/Cella(gitar), dan Haposan Haryanto Tobing/Posan (drum), yang kemudian merilis album pertama yang berjudul Kotak.

Namun, pada tahun 2007, Pare dan Icez mengundurkan diri. Posisi vokal pada akhirnya diisi oleh Swasti Sabda Tantri (Tantri), sedangkan pada bass digantikan oleh Chua, yang kemudian merilis album bertajuk Kotak Kedua pada tahun 2009.

Formasi baru tersebut ternyata membawa kesuksesan besar bagi Kotak. Bukan hanya karena ring back tone (RBT) yang terjual lebih dari satu juta semata, performa mereka di atas panggung juga menjadikan mereka band yang banyak dicari dan mendapat tawaran tur ke berbagai daerah di Indonesia.

Namun sayang, perubahan formasi harus terjadi lagi di tubuh band yang satu ini. Kali ini, Posan yang hengkang dari posisinya sebagai drummer. Kendati demikian, tak menyurutkan semangat Kotak untuk merampungkan album terbaru mereka Energi: Tendangan Dari Langit (Agustus 2011).

KARIR
Dengan mengusung musik modern rock yang sedikit bernuansa dark, serta didukung penampilan gothic, membuat Kotak langsung mendapat tempat di hati para penikmat musik Indonesia.

Debut album pertama diluncurkan pada 2005 dengan title KOTAK. Album self title ini berisi 10 lagu, di antaranya Hilang, Terbang (Khayal), Damai Hati, Kau Pilih Dia, serta banyak lagi lagu lainnya. Album ini cukup diterima oleh para Kerabat Kotak (sebutan fans Kotak).

Selang 3 tahun kemudian, band asal Jakarta ini kembali mengeluarkan album KOTAK KEDUA. Album dengan 12 track ini, berada di bawah label Warner Music Indonesia yang menjagokan hits, Beraksi, Masih Cinta dan Tinggalkan Saja.

Nama Kotak semakin diperhitungkan di belantika musik Indonesia, Terbukti Tantri dkk berhasil meraih Grup Rock Terbaik dan Album Rock Terbaik dalam ajang AMI 2009. 

Tak hanya itu, mereka juga mendapat predikat Grup Pendatang Baru Terbaik versi Anugerah Planet Musik 2009, dan meraih Most Favourite Breakthrough Artist 2009 dari MTV Indonesia Awards.

Menjelang akhir 2009, Kotak kembali merilis single teranyarnya. Single dengan judul Pelan-Pelan Saja ini merupakan 'jembatan' menuju album ketiga Kotak yang bertajuk ENERGI, yang dirilis pada November 2010.

DISKOGRAFI
Album:
• The Dream Band "Delapan" (Desember 2004) - album kompilasi
• Kotak (Juni 2005)
• Kotak Kedua (Mei 2008)
• Energi (November 2010)
→ Energi: Tendangan dari Langit (Agustus 2011)
info.name: KOTAK BAND

info.description: The Gap Band was an American R&B and funk band, who rose to fame during the 1970s and 1980s. Comprising brothers Charlie, Ronnie and Robert Wilson, the band first formed as the Greenwood, Archer and Pine Street Band in 1967 in their hometown of Tulsa, Oklahoma. The group shortened its name to The Gap Band in 1973. After 43 years together, they retired in 2010.HistoryEarly yearsAfter having grown up with a Pentecostal minister father, Ronnie Wilson formed the Greenwood, Archer, and Pine Street Band in 1967, with Tuck Andress (later of Tuck and Patti), Roscoe "Toast" Smith and Chris Clayton. In 1972, Ronnie's younger brother Charlie joined the band, and their younger brother Robert became the band's bassist in 1973. Eventually the band would be condensed to comprise the trio of Ronnie, Robert and Charlie Wilson.Early on, the group took on a funk sound more reminiscent of the early 70s. This style failed to catch on, and their first two LP's, 1974's Magician's Holiday and 1977's The Gap Band (not to be confused with their 1979 album) failed to chart or produce any charting singles. However, they were introduced to LA producer Lonnie Simmons, who signed them to his record label, Total Experience Records. Simmons had recently gotten a distribution deal with Mercury/PolyGram.
info.name: The Gap Band

info.about: Bending bluegrass, rock and countless other influences that the band cites, Yonder has pioneered a sound of their own. www.yondermountain.com
info.band_members: Adam Aijala, Ben Kaufmann, Jeff Austin, Dave Johnston
info.bio:
Yonder Mountain String Band has always played music by its own set of rules.  Bending bluegrass, rock and countless other influences that the band cites, Yonder has pioneered a sound of their own.  With their traditional lineup of  instruments, the band may look like a traditional bluegrass band at first glance but they’ve created their own music that transcends any genre.  Dave Johnston points out “What could be more pure than making your own music.”  Yonder’s sound cannot be classified purely as “bluegrass” or “string music” but rather it’s an original sound created from “looking at music from [their] own experiences and doing the best job possible.”  The band continues to play by their own rules on their new record The Show.

The Colorado-based foursome has crisscrossed the country over the past eleven years playing such varied settings as festivals, rock clubs, Red Rocks Amphitheater in the band’s home state, and recently the Democratic National Convention in Denver at Mile High Stadium opening for Barack Obama.  Their loyal fanbase has been built from this diverse setting of music venues as fans latched on to their genre-defying original sound.
 
In between tours the band spent time this last year working on its fifth studio album. Set for a September 1 release on the band’s own label, The Show is the second album with rock producer Tom Rothrock (Beck, Elliott Smith, Foo Fighters). While some might scratch their heads as to why a string band would want a rock producer, this decision was a natural choice for the band.  “We don’t have a lot of nostalgia for the past,” says banjo player Dave Johnston. “You shouldn’t try to recreate the 1940s. I like to think of us as informed by the past and all the great performers before us. But we also want to look forward rather than give people something that has already been perfected.”
 
The Show has the similar acoustic instrumentation (Adam Aijala on guitar, Johnston on banjo, Jeff Austin on mandolin and Ben Kaufman on bass with all four singing) as many of its classic bluegrass forefathers. Though once again drums are present (as with the self-titled fourth album) with the great Pete Thomas of Elvis Costello’s bands adding a rhythmic backdrop to Yonder’s still-acoustic sound on six of the tracks. The record consists of thirteen songs all written by Yonder.
  
The band has long cited such varied influences as the bluegrass of Del McCoury, Johnson Mountain Boys, Jimmy Martin, Bill Monroe, Osborne Brothers as well as the punk rock of Bad Religion, Black Flag and the Dead Kennedys.  Somewhere in between these two tent poles are early 20th Century composers and alternative rock bands like Grandaddy and Postal Service. It’s  all funneled through the band’s unique chemistry, honed since they first met at an informal club performance in 1998. With band members writing individually, in different pairings and as a collective, the album proves that this group is a collection of creative peers and you can hear it in the rich tapestry of music that makes up The Show.
 
Here Yonder offers such traditional bluegrass sounding fare as “Out Of The Blue” and “Casualty.” The band has explored its country roots in the past and does so again this time on “Steep Grade, Sharp Curves,” a song that describes the roads around its home base in Nederland as well as a particularly dangerous femme fatale.  A little further from the roots is the impressionistic “Isolate” with its simple but ominous bass line and minimal arrangement. There is also a bevy of rockers like “Complicated,” “Fingerprints” and “Belle Parker,” a gem of a song about a hard-hearted woman. The band even finds some excellent middle ground between bluegrass and rock on “Fine Excuses” thanks in part to a scorching guitar solo from Adam Aijala. There is also the extended “Honestly” -- at eight-minutes, the longest song on the album, with a middle section that is an excellent platform for lengthier live excursions that are as improvisatory as any electric band on the live music circuit.
 
The band is a regular at bluegrass festivals like the Telluride Bluegrass Festival and the band's own Northwest String Summit as well as massive multi-stage events like Austin City Limits Festival, Bonnaroo and Rothbury.  Fans are no doubt drawn to Yonder’s anything goes attitude, its humor and passion about music, and the band’s ability to stretch out live.  “We love that people come to see us,” Johnston points out. “Everyone appreciates good music. Some people want to go to a recital and some people want to party.”
 
But as its fans know, Yonder Mountain String Band does something a little different, more than just a musical party. The Show is the band’s most varied and versatile album to date, and the summation of the journey that these guys are on together. It’s bluegrass for the masses, acoustic tunes filled with dazzling chops, and it’s fun to boot. The humble Johnston sounds as surprised as anyone by the band’s success, but knows that it all boiled down to chemistry, which has never changed. “Somewhere down there we all kind of recognized that we had something unique,” he explains. “But there is no way I could have imagined the amount of success that the band has had.”
info.influences: John Hartford, Tim O'Brien, Grateful Dead, Talking Heads, Phish, Sam Bush and so many more...
info.name: Yonder Mountain String Band

info.about: ST12 Official Fan Pages More info: http://www.trinityproduction.com Follow Us on Twitter : @ST12_Band @TrinityOptimaP
info.band_members:
Muhammad Charly van Houten (Charly) - Vocal
Ilham Febry (Pepep) - Drum
Dedy Sudrajat (Pepeng) - Guitar
info.bio:
ST12 dibentuk pada tanggal 20 Januari 2005, diawali  dengan perkenalan Ilham Febry (Pepep), Muhammad  Charly Van Houten (Charly), Dedy Sudrajat ( Pepeng)  dan Iman Rush, di studio rental milik Pepep di  Bandung. Pertemuan yang kerap terjadi membuat mereka  semakin akrab hingga akhirnya mereka sepakat untuk  membentuk sebuah band, yang diberi nama ST12.

Nama ST12 diberikan oleh ayah dari Pepep, Helmi Aziz  (alm) yang merupakan kepanjangan dari Stasiun Timur  12, alamat studio rental tempat mereka bertemu.

Perjuangan ST12 untuk mendapatkan label akhirnya  berbuah ketika album perdana mereka Jalan Terbaik,  berhasil di release di bawah label Music Plus pada  tahun 2005. Tiga single menjadi hits di album ini,  'Aku Tak Sanggup Lagi', 'Aku Masih Sayang', dan  'Rasa Yang Tertinggal'. Keinginan untuk menggapai  eksistensi di dunia music membuat mereka rela untuk  menjalani berbagai rangkaian tour show panjang.  Kerja keras ST12 tak sia-sia, penjualan album  perdana mereka mencapai lebih dari 400.000 copies  dan Ring Back Tone nya diunduh hingga lebih dari  1.000.000 download.

Namun ditengah usaha keras mereka untuk mencapai  kesuksesan, Charly, Pepep, dan Pepeng harus menerima  kenyataan pahit kehilangan salah satu personel ST12  - Iman Rush - yang meninggal dunia di Semarang  akibat pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak pada tgl 22  Oktober 2005.

Tahun 2008, ST12 merilis album P.U.S.P.A dibawah  label PT. Trinity Optima Production. Di album ini,  Charly menciptakan lagu 'Saat Terakhir' yang  didedikasikan untuk Iman Rush. Lagu 'Puspa' dengan  cepat diterima oleh pecinta musik Indonesia. Lagu  ini berada di puncak tangga lagu di radio-radio  Indonesia selama 5 (lima) minggu dan bertahan di  chart selama 15 (lima belas) minggu. Tak putus hanya  di lagu Puspa, eksistensi ST12 semakin kuat dengan  direleasenya single-single lain dari album Puspa.  Lagu 'Cari Pacar Lagi', 'Saat Terakhir', dan 'Jangan  Pernah Berubah', membawa ST12 masuk ke jajaran artis  teratas di Indonesia.

Hanya dalam rentang waktu 3 (tiga) bulan, ST12  berhasil meraih penghargaan double platinum award  atas penjualan album PUSPA. Tak hanya itu, pengakuan  atas karya ST12 juga terlihat dari digunakannya  lagu-lagu ST12 sebagai themesong di berbagai  sinetron yang tayang di televisi.

Padatnya jadwal show, kini menjadi keseharian  mereka. Namun perjalanan panjang masih menanti di  depan mata, kini perjuangan yang dihadapi oleh ST12  adalah mempertahankan eksistensi yang kini sudah  diraih.
info.name: ST12 Band

info.about: www.whiteeaglesband.com
info.band_members: Arshia White Eagles & Bardia White Eagles
info.bio:
Introduction
Seeing the boy selling paper tissues in the street, they ask themselves what is this boy doing in a jungle of cars and all the hustle and bustle. Where are his mother and father? Why is he not at school? … To get an answer, they go to their teacher, but her answers only make new questions for them …
… and this is just the beginning of a path toward finding “Peace”. The Whiteeagles fly for “Peace” in the hope of having grown-ups make friends, just like children do.
Peace Song
The word “Peace” is regarded sacred in all cultures and nations. All peace-loving people in the world, who are after happiness for all humans, have in fact tried to create a real peace in the four corners of the world so that all humans can live peacefully together. However, unfortunately, it seems that in earthly life there are forever quarrels and wars among those who forget peace, causing nothing but destruction, homelessness, and poverty. Moreover, the main victims are innocent and defenseless children. Numerous are the instances of children who have lost their homes in wars, many of whom have lost their families and friends. The highest aspiration of the Whiteeagles is for all these destructions and sorrows to come to an end. Therefore, they decided to sing a song to inform the world of all the pain and suffering of war children and to remind grown-ups of their true and sincere childhood friendships. 
With this goal in mind and under the supervision of their teachers, they wrote the “Peace” song and composed appropriate music for it. Then, the Whiteeagles spent several months practicing and rehearsing the song to really master it. Immediately after the release of “Peace”, there was a widespread support which was quite predictable, because “what comes from the heart reaches the heart”. The high turnout for the Whiteeagles’ live concert at the Sadabad Palace in November 2011 was an eloquent affirmation of the right path chosen by Arshia and Bardia. It was then when they decided to make a video clip for the song so that – with its distribution – the full potential of the song and its message could be reached, enabling people all around the world to hear the cry for peace. The DVD you are holding is the culmination of all the efforts to make it happen. 
When their song and the video clip change hands among people, at any age, of every color and race, the Whiteeagles heartily hope that it is a small step toward a great cause: “together we can all witness brighter days”.
Arshia’s biography
Arshia was born in Iran in 1998. Arshia’s personal passion for music and playing musical instruments began since his early years. At the age of four, he started learning music, playing the organ and the flute. Then, he continued learning the piano more seriously, and at the age of 7 he chose the violin to play professionally. In the process of learning classical music, he gradually became interested in modern and alternative music. His piano classes helped Arshia’s singing talent to flourish, which was the beginning of him, following his artistic pursuit of both singing and playing seriously.  
Bardia’s biography
Bardia was born in Iran in 1999. Bardia also began his music lessons together with Arshia. Then, at the age of 6, in addition to learning the piano, he chose the guitar as his professional instrument to play. He also, under the supervision of his teachers, became interested in singing. Bardia has been receiving quality education and training from his expert teachers. 
Arshia and Bardia’s interests in other types of art such as painting helped the growth of other artistic senses and creative skills in the Whiteeagles, which later on played an important role in the evolutionary development of their artistic styles. 
The education of the boys has not been just restricted to music. Arshia and Bardia have been homeschooled to learn all lessons necessary to have a better perception of the world. Love for and understanding nature are among their most important lessons. They have learned about planting to feel the actual meaning of growth and the process of nature turning green. Arshia and Bardia love animals, and they live with them in order to realize that God has created animals, and therefore, like humans, they also have the right to live.
In today’s world, known as the communication era, any artist who wishes to get their message across to the world should speak a language which almost everybody can understand. Therefore, since early childhood, Arshia and Bardia started learning English and French, to help not only the audience speaking their same mother tongue, but also other people in the world to hear the song of peace and friendship and to sing with them in unison. It is an undeniable truth that the more audience for the Whiteeagles, the more their enthusiasm and strength, the more far-reaching effects. 
Using their instructors’ experiences with hard regular exercise, the boys have stretched their abilities so well that they can now very easily cope with challenging and demanding rehearsals necessary for their live concerts and video clips. Horse riding, skating, and swimming are among Arshia and Bardia’s other favorite sports.  
There are a lot of musicians all around the world who, in addition to their musical skills, also choose other forms of arts so that they can convey their message to their audience through those other channels as well. Along the same line, Arshia and Bardia also portray the joy of life on the canvas of their paintings. Their distinctive style, which considers even the frame as part of the canvas and therefore their painting continues onto it, comes from their special distinctive outlook on the art of painting. Behind each of their paintings, you can trace a concern, which is the eternal concern of humans: peace. 
The birth of the Whiteeagles
In March 2010, the Whiteeagles had their debut performance with the cover version of the Beatles’ hit “Yesterday”. This song has been covered numerous times in the world; therefore, singing it with a different style is a big challenge. However, with their distinctive style, the Whiteeagles accomplished it.
Eight months later, in November 2010, the Whiteeagles sang “Never Give Up” and made its video. This song won the Whiteeagles a legion of fans, which marked a new phase in their singing career, so they decided to create their own song and music. Despite having the support of their first-class advisers, their own intellectual independence and special artistic creativity have been prioritized. 
The Whiteeagles’ distinctive performances have gradually been developing since their third and fourth works, i.e. “Joy in Joy” and “My Shadow”, in 2011, the performance of which turned the Whiteeagles into one of the youngest pop-rock bands ever, a really great experience for them. 
The preparation of “Peace” video clip, the fifth and the newest work of the Whiteeagles, started in 2011. This video clip is a combination of various techniques. The videography of the children and the singers were in the form of green curtain and the other sections were done by linear animation and digital composition. 
The Whiteeagles’ next project entitled “Set up the Fire” is a joyful video clip taking into account the international taste of the young, which is unique in its own right. 
This video clip is a combination of the actual urban spaces and virtual robotic 3-D characters, telling the story of modern urban life and people in the machine era. 
    

مقدمه
وقتی پسرک دست فروش را می‌بینند از خودشان می‌پرسند این پسر در بین جنگل ماشینها و هیاهوی مردم چه می‌کند؟ پدر و مادرش کجا هستند؟ چرا الآن در مدرسه نیست؟... برای گرفتن پاسخ به سراغ معلمشان می‌روند، اما پاسخ او سؤالهای بعدی را در ذهن آنها ایجاد می کند...
...و این تازه اول راه است. راهی به سمت پیدا کردن صلح. عقابهای سپید برای صلح پرواز می‌کنند، به این امید که بزرگترها هم مثل بچه ها با هم دوست باشند.
ترانه صلح
واژه صلح واژه‌ای مقدس در بین تمام فرهنگ‌ها و ملیت‌ها به شمار می‌رود. تمام حامیان صلح که در جهان برای سعادت بشر کوشیده‌اند در تلاش بودند که در زمین صلحی واقعی شکل بگیرد و انسانها در کنار یکدیگر بتوانند با آرامش و دوستی زندگی کنند. اما متاسفانه روی این کره خاکی همیشه نزاع و جنگ بین انسانهائی که صلح را فراموش می‌کنند رخ می‌دهد که نتیجه آن هم چیزی جز ویرانی، آوارگی و فقر نیست و قربانیان اصلی این دشمنی‌ها کودکان بی‌گناه و بی‌دفاع هستند. چه بسیار کودکانی که در جنگ‌ها بی‌خانمان شده‌اند و بسیاری از آنها خانواده و دوستانشان را از دست داده‌اند. آرمان واقعی عقابهای سپید پایان یافتن این ویرانی و غم در سرتاسر جهان برای همیشه است. بنابراین تصمیم گرفتند با خواندن ترانه‌ای دنیا را از درد و رنج کودکان جنگ آگاه کنند و آدم بزرگ‌ها را به یاد دوستی‌های پاک و بی آلایش دوران کودکیشان بیندازند.
با این هدف و با راهنمائی اساتیدشان شعر "صلح" سروده و ملودی مناسب آن نیز ساخته شد. سپس عقابهای سپید چند ماه را صرف تمرین و اجرای آهنگ کردند تا به پختگی کامل رسیدند. بلافاصله پس از انتشار ترانه "صلح"، استقبال فو‌ق‌العاده‌ای از آن شد که قابل پیش‌بینی بود چرا که هرچه از دل برآید لاجرم بر دل نشیند و استقبال شنوندگان از اجرای زنده عقابهای سپید در نوامبر 2011 در کاخ سعدآباد مهر تائیدی بود بر درستی راهی که ارشیا و بردیا انتخاب کرده بودند. پس از آن بود که تصمیم گرفتند ویدئو کلیپی برای این ترانه بسازند تا با پخش آن پتانسیل واقعی ترانه و پیامش به فعل درآید و همه مردم جهان صدای صلح را بشنوند. این "دی‌وی‌دی" که اکنون در دستان شماست نتیجه تلاشها برای به ثمر نشاندن آن تصمیم است.
آرزوی قلبی عقابهای سپید این است که با پخش این ترانه و کلیپ در سرتاسر جهان و دست به دست شدنش در بین همه، چه کودک و چه بزرگسال و از هر رنگ و نژاد، قدمی کوچک برای رسیدن به هدفی بزرگ برداشته باشند تا "در کنار یکدیگر روزهای روشن‌تری را ببینیم"
بیوگرافی ارشیا
ارشیا در سال 1998 در ایران به دنیا آمد. علاقه شخصی ارشیا به موسیقی و نوازندگی در همان دوران طفولیت شکل گرفت. در سن 4 سالگی آموزش‌های موسیقیائی خودش را با نوازندگی ساز ارگ و فلوت آغاز کرد. بعد از آن ساز پیانو را به شکل جدی‌تری ادامه داد و در 7 سالگی ویلن را به عنوان ساز تخصصی خود انتخاب نمود و همزمان با گذراندن دوره های آموزش موسیقی کلاسیک، به‌تدریج  به موسیقی مدرن و آلترناتیو علاقه‌مند شد. آموزش در کلاس‌های پیانو باعث شکوفائی استعداد ارشیا در زمینه خوانندگی شد و این آغازی بود برای ادامه جدی و علمی نوازندگی و خوانندگی در کنار هم. 
بیوگرافی بردیا
بردیا در سال 1999 در ایران به دنیا آمد. بردیا نیز دوره¬های آموزش موسیقی و نوازندگی خود را در کنار برادرش ارشیا آغاز کرد. بعد از آن در سن 6 سالگی همزمان با نوازندگی پیانو، گیتار را به عنوان ساز تخصصی خود انتخاب کرد و او نیز تحت تعلیم اساتیدش به خوانندگی علاقمند شد. بردیا همچون برادرش تعلیم و آموزش را همچنان تحت نظر اساتید مجرب ادامه می‌دهد.
علاقه ارشیا و بردیا به هنرهای دیگری مثل نقاشی باعث شکل گیری روحیات هنری و خلاقانه دیگری در عقابهای سپید شد که بعدها نقش مهمی در تکامل نگرش هنری آنها ایفا کرد. 
درآموزش پسرها فقط به موسیقی بسنده نشد. ارشیا و بردیا تمام آن چیزهائی که برای درک جهان باید بیاموزند را به صورت تدریس خانگی (Home School) فرا می‌گیرند. دوستی و آشنائی با طبیعت از مهمترین این درسهاست. گیاه‌کاری را یاد گرفتند تا مفهوم رویش و سبز شدن را لمس کنند و عاشق حیوانات هستند و با آنها زندگی می‌کنند تا درک کنند که آنها هم مانند انسانها مخلوق خداوند هستند و حق حیات دارند.
در دنیای امروز که عصر ارتباطات لقب گرفته هر هنرمندی برای رساندن پیامش به جهانیان باید به زبانی سخن بگوید که همگانی باشد. از اینرو از همان کودکی ارشیا و بردیا تحت تعلیم مربیان، زبانهای انگلیسی و فرانسه را آموخته‌اند تا در کنار مخاطب همزبانشان، سایر مردم جهان آواز دوستی و صلحشان را بشنوند و با آنها هم‌آواز شوند. این یک واقعیت مسلم است که هر چقدر مخاطبان عقاب‌های سفید بیشتر باشند آنها با قدرت و دلگرمی بیشتری به راهشان ادامه خواهند داد و تاثیرگذارتر خواهند بود.
پسرها با بهره گیری از تجربیات مربیان خود و با ممارست و تلاش زیاد هم‌اکنون به راحتی از پس تمرین‌های سخت و طاقت‌فرسائی که برای اجراهای زنده و کلیپ‌های ویدئویی باید داشته باشند برمی‌آیند. سوارکاری، اسکیت و شنا دیگر ورزشهای محبوب ارشیا و بردیا هستند.
موسیقیدان‌های زیادی در سرتاسر جهان علاوه بر موسیقی، هنرهای دیگری را هم برمی‌گزینند تا بتوانند در کنار موسیقی از طریق این هنرها هم حرفهایشان را به گوش مخاطبان برسانند. در این راستا ارشیا و بردیا هم شور زندگی را بر روی بوم نقاشی به تصویر می‌کشند. سبک متفاوت آنها که حتی قاب نقاشی را هم جزئی از بوم می‌بینند و خلق تصویر را تا آن ادامه می‌دهند نشأت گرفته از نگاه ویژه و خاصشان به هنر نقاشی است. در پس تمام نقاشی‌هایشان هم می‌توان رد یک دغدغه را گرفت، همان دغدغه ازلی و ابدی انسان، صلح.
تولد گروه "عقاب‌های سپید"
در مارس 2010 عقابهای سپید اولین آهنگشان را خواندند؛ ترانه معروف "Yesterday" از گروه بیتلز. این ترانه بارها و بارها توسط خوانندگانی در سرتاسر جهان خوانده شده و بازخوانی آن با سبکی متفاوت چالشی بزرگ محسوب می‌شد، اما عقابهای سپید با اجرائی متفاوت از عهده آن برآمدند.
به فاصله هشت ماه و در نوامبر 2010 عقابهای سپید ترانه و ویدئو کلیپ "Never Give Up" را ضبط کردند. با شنیده شدن این ترانه خیلی زود طرفداران بسیاری برای خود دست و پا کردند، حالا دیگر کارشان وارد فاز جدیدی شده بود. بنابراین تصمیم گرفتند که موسیقی خودشان را خلق کنند. اگر چه در این راه مشاوران طراز اولی همراهشان بودند و هستند اما استقلال فکری و خلاقیت‌های هنری خاص خودشان در اولویت است.
اجراهای خاص عقابهای سپید به تدریج و از سومین و چهارمین کارشان          "Joy In Joy" و "My Shadow" در سال 2011 شکل گرفت. ترانه هایی که با آن عقابهای سپید تبدیل به کم سن و سال ترین گروه راک ـ پاپ شد که تجربه‌ای بسیار بزرگ برای آنها محسوب می‌شد.
ساخت ویدئو کلیپ صلح، پنجمین و جدیدترین کار گروه عقابهای سپید در سال 2011 آغاز شد. این ویدئو کلیپ تلفیقی از تکنیک های مختلف می‌باشد. بخش‌های تصویربرداری از کودکان و خوانندگان بصورت پرده سبز و بقیه بخش‌ها بصورت انیمیشن خطی و کامپوزیت (تلفیق) کامپیوتری انجام شد. پروژه ساخت این ویدئو کلیپ سنگین و پیچیده در مارچ 2012 به اتمام رسید. 
پروژه آینده‌ی گروه عقابهای سپید ویدئو کلیپی است شاد به نام "Set Up The Fire" که با در نظر گرفتن سلایق بین‌المللی جوانان در نوع خود بی‌نظیر است.
این ویدئو کلیپ تلفیقی از فضاهای واقعی شهری و کاراکترهای کامپیوتری رباتیک سه بعدی می‌باشد که روایتی است از زندگی شهری مدرن و انسانهای عصر ماشین.

info.description: Babes in Toyland was an American punk rock band formed in Minneapolis, Minnesota in 1987. The band was formed by Oregon native Kat Bjelland (lead vocals and guitar), with Lori Barbero (drums) and Michelle Leon (bass), who was later replaced by Maureen Herman in 1992. Courtney Love had a very brief stint in the band in 1987 as a bass player, before being kicked out and forming Hole in 1989.Between 1989 and 1995, Babes in Toyland released three studio albums; Spanking Machine (1989), the commercially successful Fontanelle (1992), and Nemesisters (1995), before becoming inactive in 1997 and eventually disbanding in 2001. While the band was inspirational to some performers in the riot grrrl movement in the Pacific Northwest, Babes in Toyland never associated themselves with the movement.

name: فريق الوعد للفنّ الإسلامي  ||  wa3ed band

info.about: الصفحة الرسمية انضمامكم يشرفنا
info.band_interests:
يتناول فريق الوعد في أناشيده الموضوعات الاستنهاضية الحماسية التي يرمي من خلالها إلى استنهاض معالم القوة والتحرر والتحدي في واقع الأمة المعاصر. ويسكب مفاهيم المقاومة في كلمات مفعمة بالقوة وألحان ملهبة للمشاعر من أجل عولمة ثقافة المقاومة والحفاظ على الذاكرة وحراستها وتثبيت الثوابت 

والإنشاد التربوي الداعي إلى تهذيب النفوس وصقل الفطرة السليمة والعودة بالذات إلى حضن التربية الإيمانية.

ويتناول أيضاً أناشيد العرس الإسلامي، حيث برع فريق الوعد في إحياء العرس الإسلامي مكرساً له وجاعلاً منه مظهراً حضارياً، يلبي حاجات المجتمع، ويرتقي إلى مستوى الفرحة المطلوبة وتحت سقف الشريعة.
info.band_members: احمد الاسدي، امير مواس، ثائر شبلي، جلال الجمل، شادي الشيخ، عبد الحي الخطيب، عدنان جنزرلي، عصام سعد، غانم صادق، محمد الاسدي،  محمود رياطي، محمد اسماعيل، محمد العلي، محمد حزبوز، وليد ابو حيط
info.bio:
انطلقت مسيرة فريق الوعد عام 1992 في طرابلس شمالي لبنان، ويتالف من 17 عضوا بعضوية طوعية من 10 فلسطينيين و7 لبنانيين. فريق الوعد مستقل ليس هناك اي جهة ترعاه بفضل الله وهو عبارة عن جهد فردي جماعي اذا صح التعبير حيث قدم نمطاً جديداً على مستوى الأنشودة الإسلامية، فقد جعل القدس والأقصى نصب عينيه، حاملاً القضية الفلسطينية بكل أبعادها، متناولاً الكثير من جوانبها بما يتلاءم مع قوة اللحن والكلمة والنبرة الهادفة والأداء المميز. وهو بحق قد أضاف على المكتبة الإنشادية الإسلامية لوناً جديداً خاصاً به. وانتاجه ذاتي من كلمة ولحن واداء وانتج وتسويق.

تلقى فريق الوعد للفن الاسلامي عدة دعوات خارج لبنان فاقام واحي المهرجانات في ايرلندا وتركيا والجزائر واليمن وسوريا والاردن وقطر والمغرب اضافة للساحة اللبنانية كما واحيا الاعراس الاسلامية ابرزها العرس الجماعي ل 500 عريس وعروس في دمشق وفي غزة فلسطين 

كما ان فريق الوعد للفن الاسلامي كانت له عدة مقابلات فنية تلفزيونية على عدة فضائيات اسلامية  فضائية المنار وفضائية الاقصى وفضائية القدس والتلفزيون اليمني الرسمي 

اما بالنسبة للمهرجانات الذي احياها الفريق والتي نقلت على الهواء مباشرة او عرضت  *مهرجان دم الاحرار يكسر الحصار والذي نقلته الجزيرة  والاقصى في لبنان
*ومهرجان دعمكم يكسر حصارهم ايضا نقلته الجزيرة وكان في لبنان،
*ومهرجان مؤتمر الحملة العالمية لصد العدوان عن غزة وكان في تركيا وقد نقلته الجزيرة وعدة فضائيات،
*ومهرجان غزة طريقنا الى القدس في ايرلندا والذي غطته الجزيرة بتقرير خاص 
*ومهرجان اليوم غزة وغدا القدس في لبنان والذي نقلته الجزيرة،
* ومهرجان حياة اف ام الرابع  في الاردن حيث كانت للفريق مشاركة والذي سجل وتم عرضه على قناة فور شباب *ومهرجان اطلاق اسطول الحرية 2 بدعوة من لجنة شريان الحياة في الاردن الذي عرض على قناة القدس، 
*ومهرجان القدس الثالث برعاية الاتحاد العالمي لعلماء المسلمين في الدوحة قطر والذي كان منقولا على الجزيرة مباشر
* ومهرجان القدس لحن الاحرار الاردن ونقل مباشرة عبر عدة فضائيات 
*ومهرجان الانطلاقة 24 لحركة حماس في غزة بدعوة من الحكومة الفلسطينية في غزة
والذي نقل على عدة فضائيات كالاقصى والقدس والجزيرة وغيرهم
 *مهرجان الربيع الانشادي والذي اطلق فيه اصدار اطياف 4 والذي عرض على فضائية اليرموك
*ومهرجان الانطلاقة 25 لحركة حماس في غزة بدعوة من الحكومة الفلسطينية في غزة
*مهرجان في تونس يعود ريعه لبناء مستشفى في غزة نقلته الجزيرة وعدة فضائيات
*مهرجان الحرية الاردن بمناسبة يوم الاسير الفلسطيني والعربي نقلته الجزيؤرة وعدة فضائيات اخرى

info.description: Cinderella is an American heavy metal band from Clifton Heights, Pennsylvania. They emerged in the mid-1980s with a series of multi-platinum albums and hit singles whose music videos received heavy MTV rotation. They were famous for being a glam metal band, but then shifted over towards a more hard rock/blues-rock sound. By the mid-1990s, the band's popularity declined severely due to personal setbacks, break-ups, and changes in music industry. Nonetheless, after a period of hiatus the band reunited and is still active at present. The band has sold 15 million albums worldwide, according to Tom Keifer's official website.
